predictions.sentence: ATH will happen and it might happen tonight, since I don't see anything but a huge rally once we go past $4,800
predictions.author: SpurdoSparde28

predictions.sentence: For me, ETH enters true bull run territory once it clears the inflation-adjusted 2021 ATH of around $6,000.
predictions.author: Numerous_Ruin_4947

predictions.sentence: It was a battle around the $60k mark (previous ATH) for a while but there really weren't large drawdowns like in previous bull runs.
predictions.author: hipaces

predictions.sentence: It was basically a battle for ATH in a fairly tight range and then once it blasted through that there was a pretty violent move up to $100k.
predictions.author: hipaces

predictions.sentence: For me, that starts when it breaks the inflation-adjusted previous ATH - around $6K.
predictions.author: Numerous_Ruin_4947

predictions.sentence: So Cowen thinks ETH failed - his top is $5k - barely above the 2021 ATH.
